actions: *Melee Weapon Attack:* +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. *Hit:* 14 (3d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.
description: An **awakened tree** is an ordinary tree given sentience and mobility by the *awaken* spell or similar magic.
languages: one language known by its creator
name: Awakened Tree
traits: While the tree remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal tree.
